name: Bow Master: Save people
description:
"Bow master is an archery game in 2019. Where you show your marksmanship ability. Your mission is to rescue all the hostages that are being hanged before the hostages are suffocated.

HOW TO PLAY:
+ When entering the game screen, players will control a bow with a certain number of names (depending on the game screen)
+ The player controls the firing power and firing angle of the bow and arrow
+ Hostages will have a certain amount of HP
+ The hostage's HP will decrease over time
+ The player rescues the hostage by accurately shooting the rope to cut off the rope or shooting at another object, causing the rope or hanging collar to break (fall).
+ If the player shoots at the hostage. HP decreases depending on the location of the shot. (Head> Body> Legs)

 WINNING CONDITIONS:
+ Rescue hostages hanged by shooting off ropes before hostages die

 LOST CONDITIONS:
+ The host's HP is 0 and has not been rescued yet.
+ Shoot all the arrows in the screen where the hostages have not yet been rescued

 FEATURES  
+ Free play. Play anywhere
+ Upgrade the bow. There are 6 different arcades you can choose from
+ When upgrading the supply to the maximum. The bow will have special effects when shooting
+ 3 male characters and 3 female characters for you to choose to rescue
+ Ragdoll combines surreal physics
+ 4 Map and more than 100 Level for you to discover
+ Upgrade HP: Upgrade hostage's blood count
+ Upgrade Amor: Upgrade hostage's resilience
+ Upgrade Gold: Upgrade the amount of gold received
+ Updrade Aim: Upgrade the line of sight to help you shoot more accurately
+ There are 2 modes of Campage Mode and Enless Mode to choose from
+ Receive daily rewards
+ Ranking helps you compete with many players around the world
+ Daily tasks help players get more rewards
+ Hundreds of Items and interesting Objects

Download ""Bow master: save peoples"" for free and share your relaxing moments with friends now!
